name: Ardent Censer
passive: Sanctify: Healing or shielding another ally enhances you and them with 10-30% Attack Speed and 20 magic damage on-hit for 6 seconds.
description: Item that provides Ability Power, Ability Haste, Attack Speed, Ability Haste. Passive effect: Healing or shielding another ally enhances you and them with 10-30% Attack Speed and 20 magic damage on-hit for 6 seconds.. Excellent for supporting allies and enhancing team capabilities.
tips: Provides unique utility that can change fight dynamics
The active/passive effect creates opportunities for your team
Great for creating picks or saving teammates
Provides excellent sustain in lane and during fights
The healing/lifesteal helps you stay in fights longer
